name: Gum-Gum Dragon Fire Pistol Twister Star
effect: [Main] If your Leader has the {ODYSSEY} type, look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 2 {ODYSSEY} type Character cards and add them to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
trigger: [Trigger] Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 5 or less.
